item.description:
Meet people interested in Dining at nicer restaurants in Rhode Island and South Coast Massachusetts!

Join us for local Dining Meetups and break bread with fellow foodies and gourmets.  Discover new restaurants, enjoy delicious meals and make satisfying conversation with friendly dinner companions.  It's a big dinner table and all are welcome!

Meetups will most likely be held on the 2nd Friday night of each month, but that's not set in stone.  Things may be switched up on occasion for special events, holidays or to accomodate members who can't make a Friday night. So keep your eye on the calender.


This group is formed with Foodies in mind and our purpose is to dine at restaurants that we may not have otherwise visited.


At the end of the meal, 2 checks will arrive.  One for food, appetizers and desserts.  And one for alcohol.

The food check will be divided equally amoung the number of people in attendance after a 20 percent tip has been added.

For alcohol -  you pay for what you've had without forgetting to add tax and tip.
item.name: Rhode Island Dining Out Meetup Group
